description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bit Crunch is a retro style twin stick shooter that focuses on exploration and adaptation.  Players are given a sprite and stats based on their name and pushed into an ever changing world.  Tasked with retrieving an orb from the boss, players set out against rooms and waves of enemies who get more powerful with each new room that's explored.
